name: Rabin Khadka
summary: Software Developer with 4+ years of experience building scalable applications using .NET, Azure, Java, and modern web technologies. Proven track record developing enterprise solutions for government and private sectors. Strong background in full-stack development, cloud platforms, database design, and API development. Passionate about leveraging cutting-edge technologies to solve complex problems and drive business outcomes.

education.degree: Master of Information Technology And Systems - Information And Computer Systems
Bachelor in Information Management - Information Management

projects: Messaging API (Java JAX-RS): Built RESTful messaging service handling concurrent requests with optimized performance
4-Tier Enterprise Applications: Developed scalable web applications using Spring, Hibernate, JSF, and EJB technologies
Cloud-Based Tweet Generator: Deployed Java application on Nectar Cloud with automated scaling capabilities
AI Chatbot Application: Integrated Google Speech-to-Text, Natural Language Processing, and Location APIs
Research Publication Desktop App (C++): Built real-time embedded system for academic research management
